subject: Basketball
Children and Youth
lead_paragraph: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The Farview Recreational Center gym is buzzing with energy on this chilly winter day, as about 30 children and teenagers shoot hoops while waiting for a free basketball clinic to start.
snippet: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The Farview Recreational Center gym is buzzing with energy on this chilly winter day, as about 30 children and teenagers shoot hoops while waiting for a free basketball clinic to start.
